name: Up Rush - Game Jam - MediaTonic
description:
Up Rush by Uprise Games
Description:
Up Rush is the 80s arcade-styled 2 player game where you must work together to reach the top of the level.

One player must control a series of shapes that fall from the sky while the other must climb on these shapes, avoiding the rising lava to reach the objective.

Controls:

Player 1:
A = Move Left
D = Move Right 
Space = Jump

Player 2:
Left Arrow Key = Move left
Right Arrow Key = Move Right

Other:
ESC = Pause
Z = Quit
R = Restart

Credits
Michael Beckwith
Dylan Wilson
Alexander Pearson
Terrence Westhall (T-Jay)
Jengo Bapp
Liam Whayman
